about_the_game:
Artpack of MareQuest: An Interactive Tail! Delve into the beautiful world of mares and snowpities with this art pack by Quote Unquote. Includes concept art throughout the development process and 4k MareQuest backgrounds.

What you get:
-24 Game Backgrounds in 4k
-March 2023 Development Images
-April 2023 Development Images
-May 2023 Development Images
-June 2023 Development Images
-July 2023 Development Images
-August 2023 Development Images

IMPORTANT!

To access the Artpack right click MareQuest: An Interactive Tail in your steam library and click properties.

Go to the "Installed Files" tab and click browse:



The Artpack should be called "MareQuestAIT-ArtPack" in your game files:



If the folder does not exist right click MareQuest: An Interactive Tail in your steam library and click properties. Click the DLC tab and ensure the INSTALL button is checked next to the DLC. The file size should be a little over 500mb added on to the base game file size.

The default path on windows should be: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\MareQuest An Interactive Tail

What you get:
-24 Game Backgrounds in 4k
-March 2023 Development Images
-April 2023 Development Images
-May 2023 Development Images
-June 2023 Development Images
-July 2023 Development Images
-August 2023 Development Images
